name: Network
description: The network object describes a network identified by a subnet mask.

uid.description: The unique identifier of the network.

labels.description: The list of labels attached to the network.

location.description: The geographical location of the network.

org_unit.description: The name of the org unit to which the network belongs.

owner_name.description: The user or department associated with the network.

priority.description: The original priority assigned to the network.

priority_id.description: The normalized priority identifier assigned to the network. The priority is useful for calculating the urgency for alerts or incidents.

subnet.description: The subnet mask identifying the network segment.
